articles.description: Chris Woakes is targeting a place on England’s winter tours after assuming the role of attack leader following the retirement of James Anderson.
articles.title: England vs Sri Lanka: Chris Woakes eyes place on winter tours

articles.description: Vinay Menon knew nothing about football when he went for a meeting at a West London mansion in 2009. A few weeks later he was in the heart of the Chelsea dressing room.
articles.title: Chelsea: Vinay Menon - Premier League's first wellness coach

articles.description: Olympic 800m champion Keely Hodgkinson will miss the rest of the 2024 athletics season because of injury.
articles.title: Keely Hodgkinson: Olympic 800m champion to miss rest of 2024 season with injury

articles.description: Jannik Sinner has been worn down by the investigation into his positive tests for a banned substance, says his coach Darren Cahill.
articles.title: Jannik Sinner: World number one 'worn down' by investigation, says coach Darren Cahill

articles.description: A Brazilian police investigation into allegations of domestic abuse by Manchester United winger Antony is closed, though prosecutors could still look the claims.
articles.title: Antony police investigation closed but prosecutors could look into allegations

articles.description: Is Conor Gallagher's £33m move to Atletico Madrid good business for Chelsea or will they come under pressure from fans for selling another academy product?
articles.title: Conor Gallagher: Will exit increase gulf between ownership and fanbase?

articles.description: Manchester City are working on a deal to bring Barcelona midfielder Ilkay Gundogan back to the club.
articles.title: Ilkay Gundogan: Manchester City working on deal to sign Barcelona midfielder

articles.description: England make a strong start to life under Ollie Pope’s temporary captaincy, bowling out Sri Lanka for 236 on the first day the first Test at Old Trafford.
articles.title: England v Sri Lanka: Tourists bowled out for 236 at Old Trafford

articles.description: Atletico Madrid sign England midfielder Conor Gallagher from Chelsea for a fee believed to be in the region of £33m.
articles.title: Conor Gallagher: Atletico Madrid sign midfielder from Chelsea

articles.description: Nottingham Forest sign Aston Villa left-back Alex Moreno on loan for the rest of the season, with an option for a permanent deal.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest sign Alex Moreno from Aston Villa on season-long loan
